attributes.action: We call for Andy Murray to be given a knighthood.
attributes.background: With Andy Murray having won his second Wimbledon title, we feel that now is the time for him be granted a knighthood. He is one of Scotland's greatest sportsmen, but also one of the finest British athletes ever. He is a role model to so many, especially in the area the Stirling Observer covers.

rejection.details:
Please refer to the following website for information on how the honours system works:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
